com.philips.platform.appinfra.apisigning

Interface ApiSigningInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HSDPPHSApiSigning

    public interface ApiSigningInterface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String createSignature(java.lang.String requestMethod, java.lang.String queryString, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> headers, java.lang.String dhpUrl, java.lang.String requestbody)
      Creates an API signer instance according to HSDP specification

    • Method Detail

      • createSignature

        java.lang.String createSignature(java.lang.String requestMethod,
                                 java.lang.String queryString,
                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> headers,
                                 java.lang.String dhpUrl,
                                 java.lang.String requestbody)
        Creates an API signer instance according to HSDP specification
        Parameters:
        requestMethod - Type of method(POST, GET)
        queryString - Request URL query.
        headers - Request http header fields. Current date is passed as http header value.
        dhpUrl - Request URL
        requestbody - Request body
        Since:
        1.1.0
